statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports;
SELECT report_id, customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT channel, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_reports ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_timestamp ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT channel FROM customer_engagement_reports ORDER BY channel ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC, engagement_score ASC;
SELECT report_id, customer_id, channel FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE engagement_score > 8 AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE completed = FALSE GROUP BY channel;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE channel LIKE '%social%' AND visit_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM customer_engagement_reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT channel_name, engagement_date FROM EngagementChannels WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT channel_name, engagement_type FROM EngagementChannels WHERE engagement_type = 'email' AND engagement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EngagementChannels WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' AND engagement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, engagement_date, channel_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN EngagementChannels ON Customers.customer_id = EngagementChannels.customer_id WHERE customer_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_report;
SELECT customer_id, channel_name FROM customer_channel_interaction ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_name, total_interactions FROM channel_performance_report WHERE total_interactions > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT channel_name FROM customer_channel_interaction;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_report GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, channel_name, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_report WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT channel_name, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM customer_channel_interaction GROUP BY channel_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, channel_name, interaction_timestamp FROM customer_channel_interaction WHERE channel_name = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT channel_name, AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_report GROUP BY channel_name HAVING AVG(engagement_score) > 70 ORDER BY avg_engagement_score DESC;
SELECT channel_name, total_interactions, average_engagement_score FROM channel_performance_report WHERE total_interactions < 1000 ORDER BY average_engagement_score ASC, total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = '2a4b8fb3-0c8c-4b13-8ce2-1c27f4b5efb8';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM Channel ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, duration_seconds FROM Interaction WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY duration_seconds DESC;
SELECT report_date, engagement_score, report_details FROM Report WHERE engagement_score > 8.0 ORDER BY report_date;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sign_up_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT channel_name, description FROM Channel WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media' ORDER BY channel_name LIMIT 5

SELECT customer_name, email, channel_name, interaction_date FROM Customer c JOIN Interaction i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN Channel ch ON i.channel_id = ch.channel_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, engagement_score, report_date FROM Customer c JOIN Report r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id ORDER BY engagement_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_engagement_reports WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channels WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement_reports ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, cr.engagement_score, ch.channel_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_engagement_reports cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id JOIN channels ch ON cr.channel_id = ch.channel_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
